Reviews.Title: good laptop
Reviews.Author: Don roe
Reviews.Content: i like it. good for games and work.  it sometimes gets a little laggy when im playing nba 2k14. Would have gotten a strong one if i had know that.  but all in all no complaints. touch screen works well,  it pretty bad no screen glare viewing angle is small. unless im at my desk at work im always having to adjust screen angle. that gets alittle annoying

ProductInfo.Features:
2.1GHz up to 2.9GHz AMD Quad-Core A10-5745M Accelerated Processor
8GB DDR3L SDRAM (1 DIMM)
AMD Radeon HD 8610G graphics with up to 4195MB total graphics memory
15.6-inch diagonal HD BrightView LED-backlit touchscreen display (1366x768)
750GB 5400RPM hard drive with HP ProtectSmart Hard Drive Protection
ProductInfo.Name: HP 15-n225nr 15-Inch Laptop (2.1 GHz up to 2.9 GHz AMD Quad-Core A10-5745M, 8 GB RAM, 750 GB Hard Drive, Windows 8)
